name: CLICKER x RHYTHM
description:
What happens when someone with little musical experience tries to make a rhythm game in 48 hours?

 Introducing CLICKER x RHYTHM, the ultimate in hypnotic idle rhythm clicking. Click to the beat of the rhythm, ish.

Controls: Left Mouse Button or Space to click

Made in 48 hours for Mix and Game Jam 2020. Theme: Mixing Genres

Music from https://opengameart.org/content/night-prowler
